Name: Administrative Complex
Description: Central office for strategic decisions. Increases overall efficiency and unlocks personnel management.

Name: Extraction Facility
Description: Industrial facility for raw resource extraction. Ensures a steady supply of materials.

Name: Logistics Center
Description: Modern automated storage. Increases resource capacity and optimizes distribution.

Name: Trade Terminal
Description: Hub for preparing and dispatching goods to market. Boosts speed and profit of sales.

Name: Industrial Plant
Description: High-tech facility for advanced material processing. A core link in the production chain.
